product_name: SRAM X9 3x10 Top-Pull Front Derailleur - Low Clamp
long_description: The SRAM X9 3x10 top-pull front derailleur brings fast, precise shifts with minimal, if any, chain rub, so you don't have to worry about your drivetrain while you're getting your trail bliss on. Steel construction stands up to demanding use; derailleur cage performance is optimized for efficient, powerful shifts and little-to-no chain rub in cross-chain combinations. Designed for use with 3x10 cranksets; max ring capacity of 44 teeth. Low-mount clamp fits 31.8 or 34.9 seat tubes (adapter included). Use with top-pull cable routing.
short_description: The SRAM X9 3x10 top-pull front derailleur brings fast, precise shifts with minimal, if any, chain rub, so you don't have to worry about your drivetrain while you're getting your trail bliss on.
